snippet.title: Ocean Keeper Roguelike - Demo Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
We're thrilled to announce #OceanKeeper, our *new roguelike game* launching this summer!

🌊Ocean Keeper – is a roguelike survival game, where you play as a Space Pirate Team that discovers secrets of the underwater planet to get the ancient artifact.
Fight huge waves of enemies, mine useful resources for your upgrades, and dig out mysteries that land behind the planet’s history.👀
Drawing inspiration from classics like Risk of Rain 2, StarCraft II, Dome Keeper, and Entropy, Ocean Keeper blends elements from each to create a unique roguelike experience that will challenge and captivate players.


📢We aren’t just announce a game – *we’re cultivating a community!*

Join the vibrant Ocean Keeper community on our official Discord channel, where you can share strategies, receive updates directly from the development team, and connect with fellow adventurers.

*Dive in today and help steer the future of our expansive underwater world!*

Subscribe now!✨

Wishlist on steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2845630/Codename_Ocean_Keeper/

Join on discord - https://discord.gg/U3RYYjnuNN

About Ocean Keeper - https://retrostylegames.com/games/ocean-keeper-roguelike-survival-game/

#roguelike #indiegames #gamedev #domekeeper #riskofrain2 #vampiresurvivor #survivor #announcement #upcominggames
